SignIn.title: Please use your credentials to sign in
SignIn.titleUsePassword: Please enter your password to continue and access your account
SignIn.verifyTitle: Sign in with your InterActive ID

SignIn.otherDeviceMessage: Swipe down the notification panel and tap on the new notification. Then, select 'Yes' and press 18 in the app to confirm your login.
